jobDescription: Job Description:SUMMARY:　 　 　 　 　  The Data Visualization Analyst understands the business with the ability to translate the needs into requirements, particularly as it relates to VBS financial performance and population health, and is also a specialist on how to visually display and analyze data with a user experience focus; works closely with the Data Developer and business to rapidly iterate over product deliverables. Must be able to convey information in a clear, focused, and concise mannerDesire to learn, grow, and seek increased responsibilityEDUCATION and / or CERTIFICATION/LICENSURE:Bachelor's degree requiredEXPERIENCE:A minimum of 3 years of previous business analytical experienceHealthcare experience preferredPrior experience with Data VisualizationExperience using Tableau or Power BI to design reports and dashboards#LI-DMG1
